column4: Forgot my passphrase (have everything else). Have a revoke certificate and revoked my public key from all all main servers. Now it shows as || *** KEY REVOKED *** [not verified] || . What is this "not verified"? How can I remove or replace this key from keyservers? Or if I can't then what is the best option for me?
i haven't created it yet.. should i??
i haven't created it new keyshould i?? will it not effect existing key on my system which is being shown as struck out in seahorse window.. or should i rather delete it before creating new pair?
